transcript.title: ECUMENICAL CHURCH SERVICE FOR VICTIMS AND FAMILIES OF THREDBO TRAGEDY
transcript.content:
ACTING PRIME RELEASE NO
MINIS TER
EMBARGO ECUMENICAL CHURCH SERVICE FOR VICTIAS AND FAMILIE OF THIREDBO
TRAGEDY An ecumnenical churc service will be held tomorrow, Friday 1 August 1997, at 12.3pni to pray for
the victims of the Thredho = raedy, their rehaives and friends, and all involved in the diflicult and
dangerous re. wue efforts.
The service will be held at St Paul's, Manuka, Canberra
Lessons will he delivered by the Governor-General and mywelf.
The Leader of the Oppoiton will be represented together with otbc-r Parlaiaentary Leaders.
NMLBOURNE 31 JULY 1997
